item.title: 爱尔兰国内生产总值（GDP）部分反弹，欧元区初现端倪
item.description: 爱尔兰经济在第一季度出现部分反弹，这可能有助于整个欧元区摆脱浅度衰退。【原文：Ireland’s economy partially rebounded in the first quarter, a gain that may have helped the euro zone as a whole exit a shallow recession.】

item.title: 阿布扎比主权财富基金计划首次出售美元债券
item.description: 阿布扎比主权财富基金 ADQ 将跟随酋长国政府进入债务市场，发行首只美元债券。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund ADQ is set to follow the emirate’s government into the debt market with its first dollar bond.】

item.title: 可可因中耕前景改善和看涨押注减少而下滑
item.description: 可可期货下滑，原因是西非的降雨提振了中期作物的前景，即使对冲基金继续削减看涨押注。【原文：Cocoa futures slumped as rains in West Africa boost mid-crop prospects even as hedge funds continue to cut their bullish bets.】

item.title: 从强劲的招聘到更多的住房，移民将如何促进美国经济？
item.description: 最近移民美国的人数激增，导致许多经济学家提高了他们的预测。现在，他们正在从数据中寻找更多的迹象来证明移民的影响。【原文：The recent surge in immigration to the US has led many economists to boost their forecasts. Now they’re looking for more signs of its impact in the data.】

item.title: 出口复苏乏力加剧越南和泰国货币困境
item.description: 亚洲新兴经济体的出口表现意外疲软，这有可能给本已因美元走强和美联储鹰派转向而遭受重创的这些经济体的货币带来更大压力。【原文：An unexpectedly weak exports performance in Asia’s emerging economies risks adding pressure to their currencies already hammered by a strong dollar and the Federal Reserve’s hawkish pivot.】

item.title: 韦丹塔寻求与贸易商达成交易，帮助为赞比亚铜矿筹资
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd）已与贸易公司接洽，寻求筹集资金以重振赞比亚孔科拉铜矿开采和冶炼联合企业。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd has approached trading houses as it seeks to raise capital to revive the Konkola copper mining and smelting complex in Zambia.】

item.title: 极端天气肆虐南方，暴雨威胁中国水稻生长
item.description: 据预测，未来几天中国将有更多的暴雨，这使人们担心这个世界上最大的水稻生产国和消费国的一些地区的早稻作物可能会受损。【原文：China is forecast to get more heavy rain in the coming days, raising concerns that early rice crops in some areas of the world’s biggest producer and consumer might get damaged.】

item.description:
高端市场是如何变得如此脱节的？【原文：

How the high end of the market became so disconnected.

item.title: 据美国广播公司报道，所罗门群岛亲华领导人索加瓦雷退出总理竞选
item.description: 据澳大利亚广播公司（Australian Broadcasting Corporation）报道，所罗门群岛总理马纳塞赫-索加瓦尔（Manasseh Sogavare）在其执政党未能在议会选举中赢得多数票后，退出了继续担任太平洋岛国领导人的考虑。【原文：Solomon Islands Prime Minister Manasseh Sogavare has withdrawn from consideration to continue as the leader of his Pacific island nation after his ruling party failed to win a majority in parliamentary elections, the Australian Broadcasting Corporation reported.】

item.title: 肯尼亚敦促为世界银行分支认捐创纪录的 1200 亿美元
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托敦促世界银行成员在下一轮融资中向该组织的优惠贷款部门提供创纪录的捐款，以有效应对发展中经济体面临的多重危机。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto urged World Bank members to make record contributions to the organization’s concessional lending arm in the coming funding round to effectively deal with multiple crises facing developing economies.】

item.title: 经济复苏仍不平衡，中国石油利润上升
item.description: 在全球油价稳定的背景下，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co. recorded its highest first-quarter profit amid steady global oil prices and even as China’s economic rebound struggles to gain traction.】

item.title: KKR 正与私人信贷基金洽谈为 Perpetual 竞购融资事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.已与多家私人信贷基金就至少 8 亿澳元（5.25 亿美元）的一揽子债务计划进行了谈判，以支持其对 Perpetual Ltd. 旗下企业信托和财富管理部门的竞购。【原文：KKR & Co. has held talks with a number of private credit funds for a debt package of at least A$800 million ($525 million) to support its bid for Perpetual Ltd.’s corporate trust and wealth management units, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国农业银行利润下降 1.6%，利润率下滑
item.description: 中国最大的国有贷款机构之一--中国农业银行股份有限公司（Agricultural Bank Ltd.）称，第一季度利润下滑了 1.6%，原因是利润率收窄。【原文：Agricultural Bank of China Ltd. one of the nation’s largest state-owned lenders, said profit slid 1.6% in the first quarter as margins narrowed.】

item.title: 印尼矿商将目光从煤炭转向镍资产
item.description: 印度尼西亚煤炭公司 PT Harum Energy 正在寻求购买更多的镍矿，同时停止对化石燃料的进一步投资，为能源转型做好准备。【原文：Indonesian coal company PT Harum Energy is looking to buy more nickel mines as it ceases further investment in fossil fuels in order to prepare for the energy transition.】

item.title: 激进派 Sachem 负责人在建立股份后将获得快递英雄董事会席位
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 已与 Sachem Head Capital Management 达成协议，将提名这位激进投资者的管理合伙人斯科特-弗格森（Scott Ferguson）进入其监事会，此前该公司已持有这家食品配送公司 3.6% 的股份。【原文：Delivery Hero SE has struck a deal with Sachem Head Capital Management to nominate the activist investor’s managing partner Scott Ferguson to its supervisory board, after the firm built a 3.6% stake in the food delivery company.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长 Wunsch 敦促对七月减息保持谨慎经济流
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）在接受 Econostream 采访时表示，欧洲中央银行应谨慎对待 7 月份连续第二次降息将向投资者发出的信号。【原文：The European Central Bank should be cautious about the signal that a second consecutive interest-rate cut in July would send to investors, Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch told Econostream in an interview.】

item.title: 德意志银行的合并结束了 Numis 交易商的精品自由
item.description: 去年 4 月，德意志银行宣布收购英国投资银行 Numis 时，伦敦金融城的一些人曾怀疑双方的文化能否融合。一年过去了，变化正在显现。【原文：When Deutsche Bank AG announced its takeover of the British investment bank Numis last April, some in the City of London wondered whether their cultures would mesh. A year on, changes are becoming visible.】

item.title: 建筑商中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI）提出关键债务条款，减值幅度高达 85
item.description: 陷入困境的开发商中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI Holdings Group Co.【原文：Distressed developer CIFI Holdings Group Co. said it has reached an agreement with a key creditor group on some terms of a restructuring plan that could cut the principal on its debt by as much as 85%, a reversal from the company’s expectations of “no haircut” a year ago.】

item.title: 在紧张局势升级之际，习近平将进行2019年以来的首次欧洲之行
item.description: 在贸易、间谍指控和北京支持俄罗斯等一系列问题引发紧张局势之际，中国国家主席习近平将在五年左右的时间里首次访问欧洲大陆。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping will visit the European continent for the first time in about five years as tensions mount over a range of issues including trade, spy allegations and Beijing’s support for Russia.】

item.title: 交易员陷入日元 "宾果游戏"，狂躁波动破坏日本假期
item.description: 亚洲交易日早些时候，日元突然暴跌至 1 美元兑 160 日元左右，当时凯尔-罗达（Kyle Rodda）正在墨尔本 Capital.com 办公室的 34 楼。交易大厅顿时炸开了锅。【原文：Kyle Rodda was on the 34th floor of the Capital.com office in Melbourne when the yen suddenly plunged to around 160 per dollar early in the Asia day. The trading floor exploded.】

item.title: 贝莱德在沙特阿拉伯首次峰会上笼络投资者
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）本周将在利雅得举办首次大型活动，在沙特阿拉伯首次举行的全球投资峰会上为企业负责人、投资者和政府高官牵线搭桥。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is set to host its first major event in Riyadh this week, playing matchmaker to corporate chiefs, investors and top government officials at its debut global investment summit in Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 政府取消能源援助，西班牙通胀加速
item.description: 由于政府继续取消有助于抑制能源成本飙升的支持措施，西班牙通胀率连续第二个月加速上升。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened for a second month as the government continued to remove support that had helped keep a lid on soaring energy costs.】

item.title: Spinneys 迪拜 IPO 定价最高，筹资 3.75 亿美元
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜的首次公开募股预计将以最高价发行，募集资金 13.8 亿迪拉姆（约合 3.75 亿美元），显示出对阿拉伯联合酋长国罕见的私营企业上市的强劲需求。【原文：High-end supermarket chain Spinneys’ Dubai initial public offering is expected to price at the top of the range and raise 1.38 billion dirhams ($375 million), showing strong demand for a rare private sector listing in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 日元汇率跌至 1 美元兑 160 日元后暴涨引发干预言论
item.description: 日元的突然反弹引发了人们的猜测，因为早些时候日元汇率跌破了人们密切关注的 160 美元兑 1 美元的水平，日本官员进行了干预。【原文：The sudden rebound in the yen sparked speculation Japanese officials had intervened after the currency earlier slid past the closely-watched 160-per-dollar level.】

item.title: 中国人民银行将对债券投资的警告扩大到地区性银行
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国央行已建议一些地区性贷款机构减少超长期债券投资，以降低风险。【原文：China’s central bank has advised some regional lenders to curtail their ultra-long bond investments to mitigate risks, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 普依格将首次公开募股指导价定为每股 24.50 欧元，处于区间上限
item.description: Puig Brands SA 和这家西班牙香水公司的创始家族将首次公开募股的价格定在了市场定价范围的最高点，这是今年迄今为止欧洲最大的一次上市。【原文：Puig Brands SA and the Spanish fragrance company’s founding family set the price for an initial public offering at the top of a marketed range, in Europe’s biggest listing so far this year.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）通过仓库交易增加迪拜房地产投资组合
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）收购了一家迪拜公司房地产部门的控股权，从而在全球最热门的商业地产市场之一获得了一块优质仓储空间。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management bought a controlling stake in a Dubai-based firm’s real estate unit, securing a slice of prime warehousing space in one of the world’s hottest commercial property markets.】

item.title: 印度交易所股价下跌，2000 万美元期权费被追讨
item.description: 印度市场监管机构要求 BSE 有限公司补缴衍生品合约费用，该公司股价周一暴跌达 19%，创下有记录以来的最大盘中跌幅。【原文：Shares of BSE Ltd. plunged as much as 19% on Monday, their biggest intraday decline on record, after India’s markets regulator requested it pay back-pay fees charged on derivatives contracts.】

item.title: 日本神田在被问及是否干预时表示 "暂时无可奉告
item.description: 日本最高货币官员拒绝就东京是否干预货币市场发表评论，因为周一货币市场大幅波动，美元兑日元汇率下跌了 2%。【原文：Japan’s top currency official declined to comment on whether Tokyo had intervened in the currency market Monday following a sharp move in the market that sliced 2% off the dollar-yen exchange rate.】
